titles.ar: باب فِي الْمُصَابِ بِعَقْلِهِ بَعْدَ التَّزْوِيجِ
titles.en: Chapter 71 – Regarding the one afflicted by his intellect after the marriage

titles.ar: باب الْمَرْأَةِ يَبْلُغُهَا نَعْيُ زَوْجِهَا أَوْ طَلَاقُهُ فَتَتَزَوَّجُ فَيَجِي‏ءُ زَوْجُهَا الْأَوَّلُ فَيُفَارِقَانِهَا جَمِيعاً
titles.en: Chapter 69 – The woman to whom reaches the obituary of her husband, or his divorce, so she remarries, and her first husband comes over, so she is separated from both of them
Chapter 70 – Waiting period of the woman from the eunuch

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (21/252)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ مَحْبُوبٍ عَنْ جَمِيلِ بْنِ صَالِحٍ عَنْ أَبِي عُبَيْدَةَ قَالَ

text: سُئِلَ أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) عَنْ خَصِيٍّ تَزَوَّجَ امْرَأَةً وَ فَرَضَ لَهَا صَدَاقاً وَ هِيَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّهُ خَصِيٌّ فَقَالَ جَائِزٌ فَقِيلَ إِنَّهُ مَكَثَ مَعَهَا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ثُمَّ طَلَّقَهَا هَلْ عَلَيْهَا عِدَّةٌ قَالَ نَعَمْ أَ لَيْسَ قَدْ لَذَّ مِنْهَا وَ لَذَّتْ مِنْهُ

قِيلَ لَهُ فَهَلْ كَانَ عَلَيْهَا فِيمَا كَانَ يَكُونُ مِنْهُ وَ مِنْهَا غُسْلٌ قَالَ فَقَالَ إِنْ كَانَتْ إِذَا كَانَ ذَلِكَ مِنْهُ أَمْنَتْ فَإِنَّ عَلَيْهَا غُسْلًا قِيلَ لَهُ فَلَهُ أَنْ يَرْجِعَ عَلَيْهَا بِشَيْ‏ءٍ مِنْ صَدَاقِهَا إِذَا طَلَّقَهَا فَقَالَ لَا .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, and Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, altogether from Ibn Mahboub, from Jameel Bin Salij, from Abu Ubeyda who said,

‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> was asked about a eunuch who married a woman, and obligated a dower for her, and she knew he was a eunuch. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Allowed’. So it was said, ‘He remained with her for as long as Allah<sup>azwj</sup> so desired, then divorced her. Is there a waiting period upon her?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘Yes. Did he not achieve pleasure from her, and she achieved pleasure from him?’

It was said to him<sup>asws</sup>, ‘So is there a washing upon her with regards to what happened from him and her?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said:’ If it was like than from him, she discharged, so upon her is a washing’. It was said to him<sup>asws</sup>, ‘So is there for him if wants something returned from her from her dower when he divorces her?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘No’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad and Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father all from ibn Mahbub from Jamil ibn Salih from abu ‘ Ubaydah who has said the following: “Once abu Ja’far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, was asked about the case of a castrated man who marries a woman, assigns mahr (dower) for her and she knows that he is castrated. He (the Imam) said, ‘It is permissible.’ It then was said that he lives with her as long as Allah wills, then divorces her; if she has any waiting period. He (the Imam) said, ‘Yes, because he has enjoyed her and she from him.’ It then was asked, ‘For whatever they may have done is there Ghusl (bath) on them because of it?’ He (the Imam) said, ‘If there has been enjoyment and because of him she has ejaculated, then Ghusl (bath) is obligatory on her.’ It then was asked, ‘Can he ask for refund of mahr (dower) in case he divorces her?’ He (the Imam) said, ‘No, he cannot do so.’”
